title: Agora 21 Participation Hub
summary: Delivered a civic engagement concept that gave residents a voice in policy making. Story-driven onboarding and accessible patterns increased reported civic efficacy by 50% in testing.

caseStudy.overview: Agora 21 explores how civic platforms can combine participatory budgeting, deliberation hubs, and local service feedback into a single, accessible experience. The prototype uses modular dashboards, guided learning states, and credibility signals to help residents see their impact.
